Package dev.gamekit.audio

Class AudioClip

java.lang.Object
dev.gamekit.audio.AudioClip
Direct Known Subclasses:
AudioClip2D, AudioClip3D
public abstract class AudioClip extends Object
AudioClip is abstract class which stores and handles playback for audio in GameKit.

All AudioClip must belong to an AudioGroup. This makes it possible to control the properties of all audio clips in specific groups by adjusting the group's properties.
